title: Assessment-Based Continuing Medical Education Certification Model Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of foundational medical education and basic statistical knowledge
context.additional_context: Project modeling and evaluating a medical education certification system mathematically.

learning_goals: The four-stage evaluation system of the CME accreditation model can be designed and analyzed using mathematical statistical techniques
Certification level determination algorithms can be developed based on learner outcome data
A multivariate evaluation matrix for measuring medical education effectiveness can be constructed
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
